sentences.en: At 235 feet tall, the rock formation is the third tallest intertidal structure in the world.
sentences.cn: 凭借着235英尺的高度，这座岩层成了世界第三高的潮间带结构。

sentences.en: Correct flood simulation of intertidal zone is crucial to marine applications such as coastal management anti - flood.
sentences.cn: 正确的潮滩显示信息是海岸带管理、防洪决策等应用的重要决策依据.

sentences.en: Embankment shell variety, mostly for the intertidal zone or shallow seabed sediment mollusc species present health.
sentences.cn: 堤上贝壳种类丰富, 多为潮间带或浅海泥沙海底软体动物的现生种属.

sentences.en: Grain orientation within the intertidal beach unit is characteristically more - or - less normal to the coastline.
sentences.cn: 在潮间海滩单位内,颗粒排列方向的特点是大体上垂直于海岸线.

sentences.en: Juveniledevelopment of intertidal creatures varies nearly as much as their physicalforms.
sentences.cn: 潮间带生物的幼体发育几乎随它们的外形变化而变化。

sentences.en: The intertidal beach unit contains some organism burrows.
sentences.cn: 潮间海滩单元含有一些生物潜穴.

sentences.en: The latter was dominant at subtidal. area , but fewer at intertidal area.
sentences.cn: 后者则是亚潮带的优势种, 但在潮间带数量较少.

sentences.en: The species, quantity and ecological distribution of mollusca in intertidal zone of Quanzhou are reported.
sentences.cn: 报道了泉州市潮间带贝类的种类 、 数量及其生态分布.

words.tran_cn: 安排于隔层之间；放在层间

phrases.tran_cn: 潮间带；潮间地区；潮间区域

trans.tran_cn: 高潮线与低潮线之间的
